entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
